property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Regenerate another target Elf. {2}{G}{G}{G}: Elf creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Great hero or grand betrayer? The truth of Ezuri's legacy is clouded by the fog of legend.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is our land. We will not allow eyeblights to poison its beauty."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dwynen's Elite enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The elves tend the forest, and the forest sustains the elves. My role is to ensure that the cycle continues."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Until end of turn, target Forest becomes an X/X Treefolk creature in addition to its other types, where X is the number of Elves you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How do the vinebred feel? Fah! We do not ask the puppet how it feels when the puppeteer bids it dance."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Vanguard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our lives are woven together like the trees' branches over our heads, forming a canopy that protects us all."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Ezuri's Archers blocks a creature with flying, Ezuri's Archers gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eyes and arrows trained ever skyward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gladehart Cavalry enters the battlefield, support 6. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to six other target creatures.) Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control. {T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Do this before you draw.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kujar Seedsculptor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every leaf, tree, and building in Kujar has been placed to achieve maximum harmony, in accordance with the elvish philosophy known as the Great Conduit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The remains of ancient civilizations litter the run-down land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains vigilance and trample until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many elves incorporate the beauty of nature into their inventions. Very few capture its savagery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) Choose up to one target creature an opponent controls. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals damage equal to its power to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Regal Force enters the battlefield, draw a card for each green creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It rarely moves, standing stock still in its clearing. When it does stir, ravens stop their cawing and crickets their chirping. All of nature watches in awed silence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance As long as you control six or more lands, Sylvan Advocate and land creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land gives of itself. Its abundance provides, even in times of chaos."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only if you've cast another green spell this turn. Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The safewright Talara protects a delicate woodland waterfall. She has vowed to send wave after wave of warriors to slay any who would dare disturb its beauty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Viridian Shaman enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She stands as a living symbol of the natural world and an enemy of the forces that threaten it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) You may cast green creature spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can call an army to my side in the blink of an eye. Best not blink."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each green creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The artificers of Kaladesh strive ceaselessly for perfection, progress, and the ultimate expression of elegance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Trophy Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 3, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tools of the past will help us forge the future."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Barrage Ogre deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves had devised countless strategies to combat Memnarch's war machines, but they had no idea what to do when one was thrown at them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to any target. Metalcraft - Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage instead if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ghirapur Gearcrafter enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. (A creature with flying can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The metal must be pure. The hand must be steady. The product must be perfect.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pia and Kiran Nalaar enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. {2}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Pia and Kiran Nalaar deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Welding Sparks deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fires of invention burn in all of us. I fight for the freedom to unleash those flames." - Pia Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) When Maverick Thopterist enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Reclusive Artificer enters the battlefield, you may have it deal damage to target creature equal to the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not wise to disturb an artist at work.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: "If there can be no victory, then I will fight forever." - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Filigree Familiar enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. When Filigree Familiar dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's the must-have gift for everyone on your list. Get one for yourself, too!" - Chammi, curio vendor

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our glorious infection has taken hold." - Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+2. Whenever an Artificer enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Inventor's Goggles to it. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil created the mycosynth. The mycosynth created New Phyrexia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens. Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Myr Sire dies, create a 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Myr artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Phyrexians, death is not an end, nor a one-time occurrence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Neurok Replica: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the curiosity of the Neurok with only a trace of their duplicity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: It deals 2 damage to any target. {1}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Melt that which was never frozen." - Spellbomb inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scuttling Doom Engine can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. When Scuttling Doom Engine dies, it deals 6 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A masterwork of spite, inspired by madness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than Thopter Assembly, return Thopter Assembly to its owner's hand and create five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Sacrifice Voyager Staff: Exile target creature. Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Voyager staffs are sought by those hoping to find an escape from the sprawling glut of Ravnica.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Structures built from darksteel yield to neither assault nor age.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Foundry of the Consuls: Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All around the foundry, automatons unhitched themselves from their mounts and pivoted to face Chandra.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kuldotha, wellspring of molten metal, temple of the goblin horde.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So even the heart of our world has succumbed." - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lumengrid, site of the Knowledge Pool, source of vedalken arcana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped. When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.
